verses.text: And it came to pass in those \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, when \add there was\add* no \w king|strong="H4428"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that there was a \w certain|strong="H0376"\w* \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* \w sojourning|strong="H1481"\w* on the \w side|strong="H3411"\w* of \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, who \w took|strong="H3947"\w* to him a \w concubine|strong="H0802"\w* out of \w Beth-lehem-judah|strong="H1035"\w*.\f + \fr 19.1 \ft a concubine: Heb. a woman a concubine, or, a wife a concubine\f*

And his \w concubine|strong="H6370"\w* played the \w whore|strong="H2181"\w* against him, and went \w away|strong="H3212"\w* from him unto her \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* to \w Beth-lehem-judah|strong="H1035"\w*, and was there \w four|strong="H0702"\w* whole \w months|strong="H2320"\w*.\f + \fr 19.2 \ft four whole months: or, a year and four month: Heb. days, four months\f*

And her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* her, to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w friendly|strong="H3820"\w* unto her, \add and\add* to bring her \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, having his \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* with him, and a \w couple|strong="H6776"\w* of \w asses|strong="H2543"\w*: and she \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* him into her \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: and when the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w damsel|strong="H5291"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* him, he \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* him.\f + \fr 19.3 \ft friendly…: Heb. to her heart\f*

And his father in \w law|strong="H2859"\w*, the \w damsel’s|strong="H5291"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w retained|strong="H2388"\w* him; and he \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* with him \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: so they did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, and \w lodged|strong="H3885"\w* there.

¶ And it came to pass on the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, when they arose \w early|strong="H7925"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, that he rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* to \w depart|strong="H3212"\w*: and the \w damsel’s|strong="H5291"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his son in \w law|strong="H2860"\w*, \w Comfort|strong="H5582"\w* thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* with a \w morsel|strong="H6595"\w* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* go your \w way|strong="H3212"\w*.\f + \fr 19.5 \ft Comfort: Heb. Strengthen\f*

And they sat \w down|strong="H3427"\w*, and did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of them \w together|strong="H3162"\w*: for the \w damsel’s|strong="H5291"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* had \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, Be \w content|strong="H2974"\w*, I pray thee, and tarry all \w night|strong="H3885"\w*, and let thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* be \w merry|strong="H3190"\w*.

And when the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* to \w depart|strong="H3212"\w*, his father in \w law|strong="H2859"\w* \w urged|strong="H6484"\w* him: therefore he \w lodged|strong="H3885"\w* there \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.

And he arose \w early|strong="H7925"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* on the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* to \w depart|strong="H3212"\w*: and the \w damsel’s|strong="H5291"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Comfort|strong="H5582"\w* thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, I pray thee. And they \w tarried|strong="H4102"\w* until \w afternoon|strong="H3117"\w*, and they did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of them.\f + \fr 19.8 \ft until afternoon: Heb. till the day declined\f*

And when the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* to \w depart|strong="H3212"\w*, he, and his \w concubine|strong="H6370"\w*, and his \w servant|strong="H5288"\w*, his father in \w law|strong="H2859"\w*, the \w damsel’s|strong="H5291"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Behold, now the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w draweth|strong="H7503"\w* toward \w evening|strong="H6150"\w*, I pray you tarry all \w night|strong="H3885"\w*: behold, the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* groweth to an \w end|strong="H2583"\w*, \w lodge|strong="H3885"\w* here, that thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* may be \w merry|strong="H3190"\w*; and to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* get you \w early|strong="H7925"\w* on your \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, that thou mayest \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w home|strong="H0168"\w*.\f + \fr 19.9 \ft draweth: Heb. is weak\f*\f + \fr 19.9 \ft the day groweth to an end: Heb. it is the pitching time of the day\f*\f + \fr 19.9 \ft home: Heb. to thy tent\f*

But the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not tarry that \w night|strong="H3885"\w*, but he rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* and \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* over \w against|strong="H5227"\w* \w Jebus|strong="H2982"\w*, which \add is\add* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; and \add there were\add* with him \w two|strong="H6776"\w* \w asses|strong="H2543"\w* \w saddled|strong="H2280"\w*, his \w concubine|strong="H6370"\w* also \add was\add* with him.\f + \fr 19.10 \ft over against: Heb. to over against\f*

\add And\add* when they \add were\add* by \w Jebus|strong="H2982"\w*, the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* was \w far|strong="H3966"\w* \w spent|strong="H7286"\w*; and the \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w master|strong="H0113"\w*, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, I pray thee, and let us turn \w in|strong="H5493"\w* into this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*, and \w lodge|strong="H3885"\w* in it.

And his \w master|strong="H0113"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, We will not turn \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* hither into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of a \w stranger|strong="H5237"\w*, that \add is\add* not of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; we will pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w* to \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w servant|strong="H5288"\w*, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, and let us draw \w near|strong="H7126"\w* to \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of these \w places|strong="H4725"\w* to lodge all \w night|strong="H3885"\w*, in \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*, or in \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*.

And they passed \w on|strong="H5674"\w* and went their \w way|strong="H3212"\w*; and the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* went \w down|strong="H0935"\w* upon them \add when they were\add* \w by|strong="H0681"\w* \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*, which \add belongeth\add* to \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*.

And they turned \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* thither, to go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \add and\add* to \w lodge|strong="H3885"\w* in \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*: and when he went \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, he sat him \w down|strong="H3427"\w* in a \w street|strong="H7339"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: for \add there was\add* no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w took|strong="H0622"\w* them into his \w house|strong="H1004"\w* to \w lodging|strong="H3885"\w*.

¶ And, behold, there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* an \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* from his \w work|strong="H4639"\w* out of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* at \w even|strong="H6153"\w*, which \add was\add* \w also|strong="H0376"\w* of \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*; and he \w sojourned|strong="H1481"\w* in \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*: but the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \add were\add* \w Benjamites|strong="H1145"\w*.

And when he had lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, he \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* a \w wayfaring|strong="H0732"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* in the \w street|strong="H7339"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: and the \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Whither \w goest|strong="H3212"\w* thou? and \w whence|strong="H0370"\w* \w comest|strong="H0935"\w* thou?

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, We \add are\add* \w passing|strong="H5674"\w* from \w Beth-lehem-judah|strong="H1035"\w* toward the \w side|strong="H3411"\w* of \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*; from thence \add am\add* I: and I \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Beth-lehem-judah|strong="H1035"\w*, but I \add am now\add* \w going|strong="H1980"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and there \add is\add* no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w receiveth|strong="H0622"\w* me to \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 19.18 \ft receiveth: Heb. gathereth\f*

Yet there \w is|strong="H3426"\w* both \w straw|strong="H8401"\w* and \w provender|strong="H4554"\w* for our \w asses|strong="H2543"\w*; and there is \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* and \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* also for me, and for thy \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w*, and for the young \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \add which is\add* with thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*: \add there is\add* no \w want|strong="H4270"\w* of any \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*.

And the \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Peace|strong="H7965"\w* \add be\add* with thee; \w howsoever|strong="H7535"\w* \add let\add* all thy \w wants|strong="H4270"\w* \add lie\add* upon me; only \w lodge|strong="H3885"\w* not in the \w street|strong="H7339"\w*.

So he \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* him into his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and gave \w provender|strong="H1101"\w* unto the \w asses|strong="H2543"\w*: and they \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* their \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, and did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.

¶ \add Now\add* as they were making their \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* \w merry|strong="H3190"\w*, behold, the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w certain|strong="H0582"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Belial|strong="H1100"\w*, \w beset|strong="H5437"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* round \w about|strong="H5437"\w*, \add and\add* \w beat|strong="H1849"\w* at the \w door|strong="H1817"\w*, and \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w master|strong="H1167"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, the \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, that we may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* him.

And the \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, the \w master|strong="H1167"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* unto them, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Nay|strong="H0408"\w*, my \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add nay\add*, I pray you, do not \add so\add* \w wickedly|strong="H7489"\w*; \w seeing|strong="H0310"\w* that this \w man|strong="H0376"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into mine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w do|strong="H6213"\w* not this \w folly|strong="H5039"\w*.

Behold, \add here is\add* my \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* a \w maiden|strong="H1330"\w*, and his \w concubine|strong="H6370"\w*; them I will bring \w out|strong="H3318"\w* now, and \w humble|strong="H6031"\w* ye them, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* with them what \w seemeth|strong="H5869"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* unto you: but unto this \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* not \w so|strong="H2063"\w* \w vile|strong="H5039"\w* a \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*.\f + \fr 19.24 \ft so vile…: Heb. the matter of this folly\f*

But the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* to him: so the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w took|strong="H2388"\w* his \w concubine|strong="H6370"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* her \w forth|strong="H2351"\w* unto them; and they \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* her, and \w abused|strong="H5953"\w* her all the \w night|strong="H3915"\w* until the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*: and when the \w day|strong="H7837"\w* began to \w spring|strong="H5927"\w*, they let her \w go|strong="H7971"\w*.

Then \w came|strong="H0935"\w* the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* in the \w dawning|strong="H6437"\w* of the \w day|strong="H1242"\w*, and fell \w down|strong="H5307"\w* at the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* where her \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \add was\add*, till it was \w light|strong="H0216"\w*.

And her \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* his \w way|strong="H1870"\w*: and, behold, the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* his \w concubine|strong="H6370"\w* was fallen \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \add at\add* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and her \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \add were\add* upon the \w threshold|strong="H5592"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, \w Up|strong="H6965"\w*, and let us be \w going|strong="H3212"\w*. But none \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*. Then the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* her \add up\add* upon an \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*, and the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w gat|strong="H3212"\w* him unto his \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

¶ And when he was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* a \w knife|strong="H3979"\w*, and laid \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* on his \w concubine|strong="H6370"\w*, and \w divided|strong="H5408"\w* her, \add together\add* with her \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*, into \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w pieces|strong="H5409"\w*, and \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* her into all the \w coasts|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And it was \w so|strong="H1961"\w*, that all that \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* it \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, There was no such \w deed|strong="H2063"\w* done nor \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* from the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: \w consider|strong="H7760"\w* of it, take \w advice|strong="H5779"\w*, and \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \add your minds\add*.
